text.div:
MedicationRequestmedicationSearchParameter

Parameter medication:reference

Searches for MedicationRequest by medication reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?medication={reference}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestmedicationSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest by medication reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?medication={reference}
